website_summaries.verdict: A good choice for trips that require packing just one tie.
pros: This rigid case with a cylinder shape fits one rolled tie
it doesn't take up a lot of space
Easy to use and does a good job preventing creases and wrinkles
Small size fits nicely in larger bags
cons: You may be able to put 2 ties in it, but you'd have to cram them to fit them

customer_reviews.title: FYI Holds only one tie
customer_reviews.text: I guess I am the first to buy this, so as a warning to others this will only hold one tie. In fairness that is all the product description provided for so its my fault. In terms of business travel it is not an efficient way to carry your ties. As a fancy gift box, this would be a super great way to give a tie.
customer_reviews.author: idesofmarch

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful
customer_reviews.text: I use this on days when I know I will need a tie for meeting with clients, but not right away. Or on a day I may need a tie, but won't know until later. I only gave this a four star rating because if your tie is long it can take a little finagling to get the magnet clasp to close.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy D.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift. Nice quality. My husband has used acrylic ones for years and loves the functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Minimad2011

customer_reviews.title: N'thx
customer_reviews.text: It seemed like a good idea, but makes your tie all curled and only fits one. Also takes up a lot of space. Got a tie wallet instead.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Snozberry

customer_reviews.title: Large
customer_reviews.text: This is much bigger than I was expecting, fairly large for a regular tie, Huge for a skinny tie
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Really  nice to use with the ties.
customer_reviews.text: It is a good protector, but the case does not always stay closed during handling when the bag isn't full.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Blakeley

customer_reviews.title: Lacked Quality
customer_reviews.text: The clasp closed incorrectly/crooked which made it feel cheaply made. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Moquin

customer_reviews.title: He seems to like it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift for my brother who travels a lot. He seems to like it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Mell

customer_reviews.title: Mediocore
customer_reviews.text: Kinda cheap for the price paid. Looks old fashion, but does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Matman1215

customer_reviews.title: ... ties while traveling and this is the easiest and best solution.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several options to protect ties while traveling and this is the easiest and best solution.
customer_reviews.author: DLM1219

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I keep two ties in her and they don’t get crushed or wrinkled on my commute to work
customer_reviews.author: Spurgeon

product_meta.title: Iristide Neck Tie Box Formal Cylinder Men's Classy Necktie Travel Storage Case (Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:Black

This item is a simple, delicate and classy men's formal style necktie storage case, which is mainly made of durable hard PU material, and a necktie accessory that store the tie inside it, ensuring the tie stay smooth and neat, and keeps it secured in any case. The tie case is suitable for business present and personal gift in formal occasions. 


Features 

- Color: mainly black. 

- Material: durable hard PU. 

- Size: about 8.5*10.5cm. 

- 100% brand new and high quality Cylinder Style Men's Classy Necktie Box. 

- Necktie accessory that store a tie inside it, ensuring the tie stay smooth and neat. 

- Suitable for business present and personal gift in formal occasions. 

--------------------------------------------------------------- 

Package Including 

1 * Necktie Storage Case (Black)
feature_bullets: 100% brand new and high quality Cylinder Style Men's Classy Necktie Box.
Necktie accessory that store a tie inside it, ensuring the tie stay smooth and neat.
Suitable for business present and personal gift in formal occasions
Neatly cylinder design, prevents wrinkles and protects tie
